> [shadowspeed](#comment_1_1Nj8tKxP4PQsXnUg2fCSwRrykCK7YsgAXx): Well, it's not a big deal. I mean, of course you can see all my comments, blog posts, etc. That's why I wrote them in the first place... right? Anyway, I find it amusing that you call "hacking" looking for a string with grep :P

The deal is that people should be aware that only what you posted but also what you visited (if you did not delete the site) is publicly accessible. For instance if you offer a copy of 0chan, we know you visited it at least once.
